entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a Hogwarts professor. He looked around blinking in the twilight and told students to change into their robes.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen was asked by Professor Slughorn to borrow a book on Nogtails.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was told by Professor Slughorn to change into his robes and was also asked to drop by and borrow a book on Nogtails.

entities.name: blaise
entities.description: Blaise was mentioned as someone who could borrow a book on Nogtails from McLaggen.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny was asked by Professor Slughorn to drop by and borrow a book on Nogtails. She also hexed Zacharias Smith.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini shot Harry a filthy look and was followed back along the train by Harry, Ginny, and Neville.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville muttered that Professor Slughorn is a strange man and followed Zabini back along the train with Harry and Ginny.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: Zacharias Smith was hexed by Ginny and kept asking about what happened at the Ministry.
